snippet: A widely revered Shiite Muslim cleric was convicted Wednesday of sedition and other charges and sentenced to death.
abstract: Sheikh Nimr al-Nimr, widely revered Shiite Muslim cleric, is convicted in Saudi Arabia of sedition and other charges and sentenced to death, raising fears of renewed unrest from his supporters in the kingdom and neighboring Bahrain.
lead_paragraph: A widely revered Shiite Muslim cleric was convicted Wednesday of sedition and other charges and sentenced to death.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Cleric Sentenced to Death
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Cleric Sentenced to Death
